summary: Michael, Arjun and Lallan, three men from three different strata of society, cross paths one morning in Calcutta and change one another's lives forever.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Abhishek Bachchan|Rani Mukerji|Vivek Oberoi|Kareena Kapoor|Esha Deol|Om Puri|Sonu Sood|Anant Nag|Vijay Raaz|Loveleen Mishra|Abhinav Kashyap|Saurabh Shukla|Simran
title: Yuva
